sidebar.register: New on the app ? Create an account in 2 minutes.
sidebar.login: Login to your HQ App account.
sidebar.tagline: Tired of having to manually synchronize your apps ? HQ will help you to synchronize your apps in real time.

signupValidation.checkMail: We just sent you an email to validate your account.
signupValidation.finalize: Click on the link in the email to finalize your registration.
signupValidation.loading: Please be patient, we are validating your account...
signupValidation.success: Your account has been successfully validated.
signupValidation.error: An error occurred while validating your account. Please contact support.

bridge.startSynchronisation: To start the transfer between the plugins, activate the synchronization with the button below.
bridge.stopSynchronisation: The transfer between the plugins is active. If you want to pause the transfer, disable the synchronization with the button below.

bridge_explanation.no_bridge: You don't have any bridge yet
bridge_explanation.instruction_bridge: The bridge is a connector that allows you to connect 2 applications together, on a specific type of transfer.
bridge_explanation.instruction_example: Example: I want to connect Hubspot and Quickbooks to synchronize Hubspot contacts to Quickbooks.
bridge_explanation.instruction_create: To create one it's simple, just click the "Create a bridge" button in the menu or the button just below.

object.tuto: First connect both plugins to select an object to sychronize.

page.notAuthorized: You cannot access to this page

payment.title: Payment
payment.required: Enhance your experience by purchasing credits for activate your bridges.
payment.success: Thank you for your payment, you can now activate your bridges or invite new members.
payment.contactOwner: Please contact the company owner to process the purchase
